channel.title: Andre_lanna on CEDIS
channel.description: Recent content in Andre_lanna on CEDIS

item.title: Software Architecture
item.description: Software Architecture is a fundamental field in systems engineering involving the structural organization of software components, their interactions, and the guiding principles that define the design and evolution of systems. This area ensures the efficiency, scalability, and maintainability of software systems, directly impacting the quality and performance of applications.

item.title: Software Product Line Engineering
item.description: Software Product Line Engineering is a specialized area in software engineering focusing on the efficient development of a family of related software products.

item.title: Project DFCris
item.description: A research project in partnership with IBICT and funded by FAP/DF.

item.title: Contextus Portal
item.description: The app and site Contextus redefines scientific analysis with NLP and ML for direct interaction with academic knowledge.

item.title: André Luiz Peron Martins Lanna
item.description: Associate Professor at the University of Brasília (UnB), working in the undergraduate Software Engineering program and the Graduate Program in Applied Computing.
